Get a broadside on the enemy and we can quickly turn
the tide of battle. If our guns can get a clear sight of the

enemy hull, we can deal some serious damage. Let's get in close
and manoeuvre to give our gunners the best possible angle of attack.

Here's our chance! With full guns on the enemy, we'll take manual
control by selecting the broadside button. Our firing arc is

smaller now â€“ indicating that we need to be at close range for
a broadside to be effective. Closing on the enemy is risky,
but a devastating broadside makes it worthwhile!

Our guns are fully loaded! Let's click the broadside button
again to open fire. The enemy have suffered the full
force of our firepower; we've ripped through their hull!
